00011 #ifndef _FM_QUATERNION_H_

00021 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FMQuaternion
00022 {
00023 public:
00024     float x;    
00025     float y;    
00026     float z;    
00027     float w;    
00029 #ifndef _DEBUG
00030 
00032     FMQuaternion() {}
00033 #else
00034     FMQuaternion() { x = 123456789.0f; y = 123456789.0f; z = 123456789.0f; w = 123456789.0f; }
00035 #endif 
00036 
00042     FMQuaternion(float _x, float _y, float _z, float _w) { x = _x; y = _y; z = _z; w = _w; }
00043 
00047     FMQuaternion(const FMVector3& axis, float angle);
00048 
00051     inline operator float*() { return &x; }
00052     inline operator const float*() const { return &x; } 
00060     inline FMQuaternion& operator =(const float* v) { x = *v; y = *(v + 1); z = *(v + 2); w = *(v + 3); return *this; }
00061 
00064     inline float LengthSquared() const { return x * x + y * y + z * z + w * w; }
00065 
00068     inline float Length() const { return sqrtf(x * x + y * y + z * z + w * w); }
00069 
00071     inline void NormalizeIt() { float l = Length(); if (l > 0.0f) { x /= l; y /= l; z /= l; w /= l; }}
00072 
00075     inline FMQuaternion Normalize() const { float l = Length(); return FMQuaternion(x / l, y / l, z / l, w / l); }
00076 
00081     FMQuaternion operator*(const FMQuaternion& q) const;
00082 
00088     FMVector3 operator*(const FMVector3& v) const;
00089 
00092     inline FMQuaternion operator~() const { return FMQuaternion(-x, -y, -z, w); }
00093 
00098     inline FMQuaternion& operator*=(const FMQuaternion& q) { return (*this) = (*this) * q; }
00099 
00104     inline FMQuaternion& operator=(const FMQuaternion& q) { x = q.x; y = q.y; z = q.z; w = q.w; return (*this); }
00105 
00112     FMVector3 ToEuler(FMVector3* previousAngles = NULL) const;
00113 
00117     void ToAngleAxis(FMVector3& axis, float& angle) const;
00118 
00121     FMMatrix44 ToMatrix() const;
00122 
00128     static FMQuaternion EulerRotationQuaternion(float x, float y, float z);
00129 
00130 public:
00131     static const FMQuaternion Zero; 
00132     static const FMQuaternion NoRotation; 
00133 };
